name: Stop Zombs
description:
"Get ready to blast your way through hordes of undead on a deserted highway in my new arcade shooter game! As the last line of defense against the zombie apocalypse, it's up to you to take out as many of the brain-hungry monsters as you can. With fast-paced action you'll have to keep your wits about you to emerge victorious. Upgrade your weapons and gear as you go to take on tougher and more formidable foes. Can you survive the zombie-infested desert highway and save humanity? Play now to find out!"
Download StopZombs 3 for the latest version! If you enjoyed please consider donating!
